story.storykicker: Vijay Sethupathi is playing the role of a medical college student in the upcoming film and he is seen in three different looks. It also stars three female leads: Tamannaah, Aishwarya Rajesh, and Srushti Dange.
story.storybody:
The teaser of Vijay Sethupathi's Dharmadurai, the long-delayed film of director Seenu Ramasamy, is finally out. Vijay Sethupathi is playing the role of a medical college student in the film and he is seen in three different looks.

The sneak-peek reveals that the film is a complete package of action, romance and family sentiments. It stars three female leads: Tamannaah, Aishwarya Rajesh, and Srushti Dange.

The film also has Radhika Sarathkumar playing the mother of Dharmadurai (Vijay Sethupathi).

The music for the film composed by Yuvan Shankar Raja. The BGM of the recently-released teaser has received a good response. Fans are hoping that the film will turn out to be the deserving comeback of the young music director, who is currently going through a rough phase. Yuvan has also composed music for another upcoming film Taramani, directed by Ram.

The film marks the second collaboration of Sethupathi and Seenu Ramasamy. They have earlier worked together in the critically-acclaimed film Thenmerku Paruvakaatru. Vijay Sethupathi will also be seen in Karthik Subbaraj's forthcoming film Iraivi, which is slated to hit the screen on June 3.

Produced by RK Suresh, the film will hit the screens in June.
